summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the State of Washington Department of Ecology for financial assistance for the operation of a research project in solid waste source separation; authorizing the Director of Human Resources to enter into a contract with a recycling agency in connection therewith; increasing a certain Object of Expenditure in the 1976 Budget of the Department of Human Resources; and making reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
